articles.description: England are spun to a feeble defeat before lunch on the third day of the final Test in Rawalpindi to give resurgent Pakistan a 2-1 series win.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Noman Ali and Sajid Khan seal 2-1 series win for hosts

articles.description: The fans were entertained at Wembley Stadium but the nature of much of the excitement would not have been what England intended during their 4-3 defeat by Germany.
articles.title: England 3-4 Germany: More questions than answers for Lionesses in defeat

articles.description: Freddie Freeman hits the first walk-off grand slam in World Series history as the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the New York Yankees in extra innings in game one.
articles.title: MLB World Series 2024: Dodgers 6-3 Yankees - Freddie Freeman hits walk-off grand slam

articles.description: Mercedes’ George Russell sets the pace in a first practice session at the Mexico City Grand Prix punctuated by a heavy crash for Williams’ Alex Albon.
articles.title: Mexico Grand Prix: Russell fastest as Bearman crashes with Albon

articles.description: Chris Wood is helping the big target man become fashionable again after his electric start to the season for Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Chris Wood: Nottingham Forest striker and Erling Haaland spark traditional centre-forward revival

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes backs his batters after another collapse condemns England to series defeat in Pakistan.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Ben Stokes backs struggling batters after series defeat

articles.description: The All Blacks warm up for next week's Test against England with a comfortable 64-19 victory over Japan in Yokohama.
articles.title: Japan 19-64 New Zealand: All Blacks score 10 tries in Yokohama

articles.description: British number one Katie Boulter loses in straight sets to Sofia Kenin in the Pan Pacific Open semi-finals.
articles.title: Katie Boulter loses in Pan Pacific Open last four to Sofia Kenin

articles.description: England hooker Luke Cowan-Dickie discusses his recovery from neck surgery, overcoming a heart problem and spending "ridiculous hours" gaming.
articles.title: England: Luke Cowan-Dickie on neck surgery, heart problems and Call of Duty

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at why Tua Tagovailoa has chosen to keep playing after his latest concussion, while the NFL's chief medical officer explains the league's stance.
articles.title: Tua Tagovailoa: Why Miami Dolphins QB is set for NFL return after third concussion
